[DQC.US.0113.9562] The company has reported a value of 7,049,000,000 for the concept us-gaap:PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross which is less than the value of us-gaap:PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcquired with a value of 7,130,000,000.
